Jay wrote:

> Hello Folks,
>
> I mentioned this in my another post but looks like it is embedded in
> the other one, so I am posting itself.
>
> Delete function from "View or Edit Frontier URIs" is broken in CVS
> Head, I think. I pause the crawl and I go into the
> Frontier URI and do search on ".*" or ".*xyz.com.*", I get the list of
> urls that I wanted to delete, at that time if I click delete, I got
> this error message.
>
> An error occured
>
> java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException

Looks like this functionality wasn't brought along when we made queues 
bdbje-based (in place of memory-based).   I've made an issue to address 
this (Either removing functionality or reimplementing it). Meantime, you 
might add a filter or deciderule -- dependent on scope used -- that 
rules out of scope URLs you don't want crawled.

St.Ack

> I saw in the code that the method is not implemented, any reason? or
> any estimate when you guys can turn your head to that?
>
>
> Since I am actively using this functionality, I would be gladly
> upgrade my crawlers if this function is working. 
>
>
